content.html:
FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING


Enable or disable Intelligent Face Detection when recording
movies.

OptionDescription
FACE DETECTION ONSee "FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING" (□ 132).
OFFIntelligent Face Detection and eye priority off.

If SINGLE AF is chosen for FOCUS MODE when FACE DETECTION ON
is selected for AMF AF/MF SETTING > FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING,
the camera will automatically switch to CONTINUOUS AF. Selecting
MANUAL FOCUS when FACE DETECTION ON is selected for FACE/
EYE DETECTION SETTING disables Intelligent Face Detection.

MF ASSIST


OptionDescription
STANDARDFocus is displayed normally (focus peaking is not available).
FOCUS PEAK HIGHLIGHTThe camera heightens high-contrast outlines. Choose a color and peaking level.
Choose how focus is displayed when MANUAL FOCUS is select-
ed for FOCUS MODE.

Shooting
Menus

content.markdown:
# FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING

# Enable or disable Intelligent Face Detection when recording
movies.

| Option | Description |
| --- | --- |
| FACE DETECTION ON | See "FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING" (□ 132). |
| OFF | Intelligent Face Detection and eye priority off. |


If SINGLE AF is chosen for FOCUS MODE when FACE DETECTION ON
is selected for AMF AF/MF SETTING > FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING,
the camera will automatically switch to CONTINUOUS AF. Selecting
MANUAL FOCUS when FACE DETECTION ON is selected for FACE/
EYE DETECTION SETTING disables Intelligent Face Detection.

MF ASSIST

Choose how focus is displayed when MANUAL FOCUS is select-
ed for FOCUS MODE.

| Option | Description |
| --- | --- |
| STANDARD | Focus is displayed normally (focus peaking is not available). |
| FOCUS PEAK HIGHLIGHT | The camera heightens high-contrast outlines. Choose a color and peaking level. |

ed for FOCUS MODE.

ed for FOCUS MODE.

content.html:

FOCUS PEAK HIGHLIGHTThe camera heightens high-contrast outlines. Choose a color and peaking level.
